sentences.en: Analysis of FT - IR showed that gelatin contained no helix structure.
sentences.cn: 红外光谱显示,该法提取的明胶不存在螺旋结构.

sentences.en: Based on the center of gravity of cab, this paper offers the improvement ways for helix spring and shock absorber of the heavy truck cab suspension.
sentences.cn: 文章在测出某重卡驾驶室质心的基础上，对重卡驾驶室悬置系统中前、后螺旋弹簧及减振器的参数进行改进。

sentences.en: Coil the fibre into a helix.
Double Helix crowded XSJ - pulp, paper pulp for the extraction of black liquor.
sentences.cn: XSJ型 双螺旋挤浆机, 主要用于造纸制浆的黑液提取.

sentences.en: Hydrogen bonding between successive coils holds the helix together.
sentences.cn: 氢键维持着螺旋的稳定.

sentences.en: Normal, double - helix DNA is spiral, like a loosely coiled spring.
sentences.cn: 正常的双螺旋DNA是螺旋形的, 像一根松松地卷曲的弹簧.

sentences.en: Some biological molecules have the form of a helix.
sentences.cn: 有些生物分子呈螺旋状.

sentences.en: Stamen is most, helix is arranged, centrifugal direction development, sometimes little at 10, often have degrade staminal .
sentences.cn: 雄蕊多数，螺旋排列，离心方向发育，有时少于10个，常有退化雄蕊。

sentences.en: Striation - Defects or contaminations found in the shape of a helix.
sentences.cn: 条痕 - 螺纹上的缺陷或污染.

sentences.en: The helix makes a complete turn every 3.6 residues.
sentences.cn: 每个3.6个残基,螺旋正好转一圈.

sentences.en: The Hubble Space Telescope has taken photos of the Helix Nebula.
sentences.cn: 哈伯天文望远镜拍下了[螺旋星云]的照片.

sentences.en: The R group of these amino acids extends outward from the helix.
sentences.cn: 这些氨基酸的R基团伸向螺旋的外侧.

sentences.en: The resulting double helix reduces friction and allows faster, easier lacing.
sentences.cn: 由此产生的双螺旋结构减少了摩擦,并允许更快, 更容易系带.

sentences.en: The technological process for making narrow - leaf helix with varying pitches was introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍一种窄片状变节距螺片零件的加工工艺.

sentences.en: There are five other double helix pairs in the DNA system.
sentences.cn: 在DNA系统里还有五条其它的双螺旋对.

sentences.en: These changes are accorded with the rule of helix theory.
sentences.cn: 这种变化关系与螺旋理论的规律是一致的.

words.tran_cn: [数][建]螺旋，螺旋状物；[解剖]耳轮

phrases.tran_cn: 螺旋角；螺旋线角；螺旋升角；节面角（伞齿轮的）

trans.tran_en: a line that curves and rises around a central line
